title: Executive Order 5663-Designating Horace Paul Bestor as Farm Loan Commissioner
content: Under the provisions of section 3 of the Federal Farm Loan Act, approved July 17, 1916 (39 Stat. 360), Horace Paul Bestor, who has been duly appointed a member of the Federal Farm Loan Board, is hereby designated Farm Loan Commissioner of said board until otherwise directed.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5663-Designating Horace Paul Bestor as Farm Loan Commissioner Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361255
